    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void addPlayground​(int id)
    add playground in our system
    void addUser​(User user)
    add user to our system
    protected void adminHome()
    this is admin home and all features he need it contain admin menu and show reported playgrounds and he can suspend or remove this playground from our system
    void displayAllAvailablePlayground​(int id)
    this fun is used to display the nearest playgrounds then display other playgrounds
    void PlayerHome​(int id)
    this is player home it allow him to add playgrounds then his type will convert to "Playground Owner" and add money in his EWallet and Booking an hours and he can show his bookings and cancel it while still in period time
    protected void playgroundOwnerHome​(int id)
    this is playground owner home it allow him to add playgrounds and add money in his EWallet
    int signIn​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
    this fun is used to sign in to the system with email and password that already stored in our system
    void signUp()
    this method is used to create a new user in our system and add it it can get all valid user info then create this user then go to playerHome fun

      password - user password
